properties.areaDesc: Coastal Cumberland; Interior York; Coastal York; Sagadahoc; Lincoln; Interior Cumberland
properties.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 11:00PM EST until January 26 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
...HEAVY RAIN EXPECTED TONIGHT...

The Flood Watch continues for

* Portions of Maine, south central Maine, and southwest Maine,
including the following areas, in Maine, Interior Cumberland.
In south central Maine, Lincoln and Sagadahoc. In southwest
Maine, Coastal Cumberland, Coastal York, and Interior York.

* Until 3 AM EST Sunday

* A brief period of heavy rain will drop 1 to 1.5 inches of
rainfall overnight. This amount of rain in a short amount of
time may cause some flooding issues in poor drainage areas
especially where storm drains may be blocked with snow. Small
streams may experience significant rises as well, but mainstem
river flooding is not expected.
properties.instruction:
A Flood Watch means there is a potential for flooding based on
current forecasts.

You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible
Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be
prepared to take action should flooding develop.

NWSheadline: FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST SUNDAY
